Navigation
Name Tutor/Markup/StructureMarkup/warning
Synopsis Mark up for a warning.
Syntax <warning> MarkedText </warning>
Description With a warning a developers note or urgent message to the student can be inserted. All warnings for a course are collected and canbe inspected later.
Examples The input:


<warning>This is an example warning</warning>


will give:

This is an example warning
[Edit] | [New Subconcept] | [Recompile Course] | [Warnings] 1 warning in this concept
